headline: Inbound Engine Proposal
subheadline: A proven system for generating qualified commercial roofing opportunities through strategic Google Ads and lead qualification.
situationPoints: You've built a strong reputation in commercial roofing through proactive prospecting, warranty work, and word-of-mouth in Des Moines
Your team is constantly looking for opportunities—everyone has their antennas up—but you're ready for a steadier, more predictable flow of leads
You're moving away from waiting for storms, leaks, or emergencies to bring in work—you want to be proactive
Your approach is different: you're not chasing one-and-done reroofs. You build long-term relationships through leak calls, inspections, and maintenance programs
You're planning to grow—adding a service team and discussing a third production crew—but you need the pipeline to support that expansion
solutionOverview: We leverage Google Ads to put WRSIA in front of commercial property owners and facility managers at the exact moment they're searching for leak repairs, roof inspections, and commercial roofing services in the Des Moines area. Every inquiry is captured, qualified, and logged so you can focus on building the relationships that lead to maintenance contracts and full reroofs.

campaigns.name: Commercial Leak Repair Ads
campaigns.description: Capture businesses actively searching for emergency leak repairs—your foot-in-the-door to long-term maintenance relationships.

campaigns.name: Roof Inspection & Assessment Ads
campaigns.description: Target facility managers and property owners looking for proactive roof assessments before problems become emergencies.

campaigns.name: Commercial Roofing Services Ads
campaigns.description: Broad commercial roofing searches for businesses in Des Moines and the 90-mile service radius looking for TPO, PVC, and flat roof specialists.

qualificationCriteria.label: Commercial Property
qualificationCriteria.description: Business, industrial, or commercial facility—no residential

qualificationCriteria.label: Decision Maker
qualificationCriteria.description: Owner, facility manager, property manager, or authorized decision maker

qualificationCriteria.label: Project Timeline
qualificationCriteria.description: Looking to address roofing needs within 30-90 days

qualificationCriteria.label: Budget Authority
qualificationCriteria.description: Has budget allocated or can approve the investment

qualificationCriteria.label: Service Area
qualificationCriteria.description: Located within 90 miles of Des Moines, or surrounding states for larger projects ($50k+)

deliverables: Google Ads account setup and campaign build
Conversion-focused landing page design and development
Call tracking with full recording capabilities
Ongoing campaign optimization (daily bid management, ad testing)
Monthly performance reporting with keyword-to-lead attribution

includedFeatures.title: High-Converting Landing Pages
includedFeatures.description: Proven pages designed to turn commercial roofing searches into qualified leads

includedFeatures.title: Professional Ad Copy
includedFeatures.description: Messaging focused on your relationship-based approach and expertise

includedFeatures.title: Real-Time Dashboard
includedFeatures.description: Track campaign performance and lead flow on any device

includedFeatures.title: Lead Tracking & Attribution
includedFeatures.description: Know exactly which keywords and ads generate your best opportunities

includedFeatures.title: Inbound Call Recording
includedFeatures.description: Record every call for quality tracking and keyword optimization

includedFeatures.title: Monthly Strategy Calls
includedFeatures.description: Review performance and align on next steps

includedFeatures.title: Transparent Reporting
includedFeatures.description: Clear breakdown of what happened and what's next

includedFeatures.title: ROI Tracking
includedFeatures.description: Attribute closed deals back to the campaigns that produced them

leadInsights.title: What You'll See For Each Lead
points: Specific roofing need (leak, inspection, full roof)
Call recording for full context before callback
Lead score based on qualification criteria

caseStudies.description: Increase in call centre staffing opportunities
Increase in local mobile sandblasting jobs
Increase in commercial kitchen cleaning leads

roadmap.title: Discovery & Setup
roadmap.description: Deep dive into your ideal customer profile, competitive landscape, and service area targeting. Account setup and tracking implementation.

roadmap.title: Campaign Build
roadmap.description: Build search campaigns for leak repair, inspections, and commercial roofing. Set up landing pages and call tracking.

roadmap.title: Launch & Optimize
roadmap.description: Go live with campaigns. Daily monitoring and optimization. First qualified leads start flowing.

roadmap.title: Scale & Refine
roadmap.description: Analyze which keywords and ads produce closed deals. Scale what works, cut what doesn't.

guarantee: If we don't deliver at least 45 qualified opportunities in the first 90 days, we'll manage your campaigns for free until we do.
stipulations: Ad spend must be maintained at recommended levels
Client must follow up on leads within 4 business hours
All lead outcomes must be tracked in shared system

about.intro: Digital Assembly builds revenue growth systems for service businesses. Since 2016, we've helped 100+ clients across the US, Canada, UK, Australia, and New Zealand generate predictable pipelines through strategic paid advertising and lead qualification. We're not a typical agency—we're partners invested in your growth.

values.title: Results Over Activity
values.description: We measure success by qualified opportunities and closed deals, not clicks or impressions.

values.title: Radical Transparency
values.description: You'll always know exactly where your money is going and what it's producing.

faqs.question: How quickly will I start seeing leads?
faqs.answer: Most clients see their first leads within 14 days as campaigns go live. The full 90-day build and proof phase stabilizes volume and pushes toward the 45-opportunity target.

faqs.question: What happens if it doesn't work?
faqs.answer: If you meet the agreed stipulations and we don't deliver 45 qualified opportunities, our guarantee applies and we manage your campaigns for free until we hit the target.

faqs.question: What do you need from us?
faqs.answer: Respond to leads fast, track every outcome in our shared system, and join monthly strategy calls.

faqs.question: How much time does this require?
faqs.answer: Outside of onboarding, minimal. You focus on calls and building relationships; we handle the lead engine.

faqs.question: Can we pause or cancel?
faqs.answer: After the initial 90-day build and proof phase, it's month-to-month with no long contracts.
